answerText: American Pastoral[10] This author of American Pastoral also wrote the title character's monologue to the psychiatrist Dr. Spielvogel in Portnoy's Complaint.
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | Finals 2 | 7 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Nathan Zuckerman narrates this novel about his friend Seymour "Swede" Levov. For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel in which the Swede's seemingly idyllic life begins to crumble when his daughter Merry bombs a post office to protest the Vietnam War.
